Wonder Weapon Medium Armor Set
kDesc

The complete Wonder Weapon Medium Armour Set, this bundle contains all five parts that make up the full Wonder Weapon Armour Set: 
 
 1. Wonder Weapon - Medium Assault Body Armour 
 2. Wonder Weapon - Medium Assault Boots 
 3. Wonder Weapon - Medium Assault Gloves 
 4. Wonder Weapon - Medium Assault Helmet 
 5. Wonder Weapon - Medium Assault Leg Armour [#Legal]

L'ensemble complet Armure moyenne Wonder Weapon, avec les cinq éléments composant l'ensemble Armure Wonder Weapon complet : 
 
 1. Wonder Weapon - Gilet d'assaut moyen 
 2. Wonder Weapon - Bottes d'assaut moyennes 
 3. Wonder Weapon - Gants d'assaut moyens 
 4. Wonder Weapon - Casque d'assaut moyen 
 5. Wonder Weapon - Jambières d'assaut moyennes [#Legal]

Das komplette mittelschwere Rüstungsset Wonder Weapon; dieses Bündel enthält alle fünf Bestandteile der kompletten Wonder Weapon-Rüstung: 
 
 1. Wonder Weapon - Panzerweste für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 2. Wonder Weapon - Stiefel für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 3. Wonder Weapon - Handschuhe für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 4. Wonder Weapon - Helm für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 5. Wonder Weapon - Beinrüstung für mittelschwere Angriffe [#Legal]

Set completo di armatura media Wonder Weapon, contiene i cinque componenti che compongono l'intero set di armatura Wonder Weapon: 
 
 1. Wonder Weapon - armatura per il corpo d'assalto medio 
 2. Wonder Weapon - stivali d'assalto medio 
 3. Wonder Weapon - guanti d'assalto medio 
 4. Wonder Weapon - casco d'assalto medio 
 5. Wonder Weapon - armatura per le gambe d'assalto medio [#Legal]

El set completo de armadura Wonder Weapon, contiene las cinco partes que componen la armadura: 
 
 1. Wonder Weapon - Armadura corporal de asalto media 
 2. Wonder Weapon - Botas de asalto medias 
 3. Wonder Weapon - Guantes de asalto medios 
 4. Wonder Weapon - Casco de asalto medio 
 5. Wonder Weapon - Armadura de asalto media para pierna [#Legal]

완전한 최종병기 중형 방어구 세트입니다. 최종병기 방어구 세트를 완성하는 다섯 개의 아이템으로 구성되어 있습니다:
 
 1. 최종병기 - 중형 돌격 상체방어구 (여성)
 2. 최종병기 - 중형 돌격부츠 (여성)
 3. 최종병기 - 중형 돌격장갑 (여성)
 4. 최종병기 - 중형 돌격헬멧 (여성)
 5. 최종병기 - 중형 돌격 하체방어구 (여성) [#Legal]

 1. Wonder Weapon - Medium Assault Body Armor (Women)
